name: Create Responsive Designs in Figma
description:
With so many different devices used to browse the web, making sure your website or application is responsive across different screen sizes is vital for ensuring a seamless User Experience. Especially considering how often we switch between devices daily. 💡


Part of a UX/UI Designers' job is to understand the different contexts and journeys users face and then apply the most appropriate responsive practices in their designs. Learn how to use Figma to create responsive designs in our free upcoming workshop taking place on 18th November at 18:00H CET.📍


Ready?! 🙌

The workshop is for beginners, so all you need is a computer, a good internet connection, and a willingness to master responsive design.
